name: The Fudgiest Oreo Brownies
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together sugar and eggs until smooth
Add melted butter and melted chocolate, whisk until fully combined
Sift in flour and cocoa powder, fold gently with a spatula
Pour mixture into a lined baking dish
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 25 minutes, until edges are set but center remains fudgy
Cool completely before slicing for clean, chewy squares
